Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Southbound Reroute near Austin/Division
ShortDescription: SB 91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Division, Central, Chicago & Austin, due to street blockage near Austin/Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Division, Central, Chicago & Austin, due to street blockage near Austin/Division.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #76 Diversey Temporary Reroute at Diversey/Narragansett
ShortDescription: 76 Diversey buses temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Oak Park Ave, Grand, Fullerton, Narragansett & Diversey, due to police activity near Diversey/Narragansett.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Diversey, Oak Park Ave, Grand, Fullerton, Narragansett, then resume their normal service on Diversey, due to police activity near Diversey/Narragansett.

Allow extra travel time.
